title: Is Brian Laundrie Still Alive?
description:
In this spooktacular episode of Fool's Coverage, Manny, a.k.a Harley Quinn, and Laura a.k.a the Joker celebrate Halloween by talking about their scariest stories, as well as they cover some real life horror tales, such as the shocking, yet confusing news of Brian Laundrie's body discovery, Alec Balwin's accidental shooting of a videographer on set, and the famous Tik Toker, Ali Abulaban, who shot and murdered his wife. Tune in and get ready to be spooked!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
Thanks to our sponsors: 

Listen to Even The Rich on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen ad-free by joining Wondery Plus in the Wondery app.

We want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage.

Buttah's so confident that it works, they're giving away their best selling sample kit for FREE. To get your FREE samples, go to ButtahSkin.com and use code Glowup at check out.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
